messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Pimping for the schools
messages.msgSnippet: ... NED! Talk about unschooling. The Unschooling.com list is not your personal soap box from which to lob rants about the public schools. It s a place to share
messages.messageBody:
on 8/23/02 11:52 AM, Luz Shosie and Ned Vare at nedvare@... wrote:

> From NHEN-SpeakOut list (digest 1373) :

NED!

Talk about unschooling.

The Unschooling.com list is not your personal soap box from which to lob
rants about the public schools.

It's a place to share our personal experiences and help each other unschool.

Joyce
Unschooling-dotcom moderator

messages.subject: Pimping for the schools
messages.messageBody:
From NHEN-SpeakOut list (digest 1373) :

>How can parents send their darling children out into the neighborhood
>I just had to tell a little boy, the cutest little fellow, that I
>wouldn't buy whatever it was he was selling. I can't encourage it.
>And he was crushed. Poor little kid.

> I want to tell him that he is
>being abused by this shameless practice of using cute kids to sell
>crap but I'm not going to lecture a little fellow who has bravely
>approached someone he doesn't know.

>I HATE this practice. Aggghhhhhhhh!<<
